noun.description: A humorous imitation of something, typically a film or a particular genre of film, in which its characteristic features are exaggerated for comic effect.
A trick played on someone as a joke.

verb.description: Imitate (something) while exaggerating its characteristic features for comic effect.
examples: it is a movie that spoofs other movies
they proceeded to spoof Western intelligence with false information

origin: Late 19th century: coined by Arthur Roberts (1852â€“1933), English comedian.
